name: Monster Hunter Generations
synopsis: The hunt is about to begin in the world of Monster Hunter! Take up the role of a hunter, seeking out and vanquishing a variety of colossal creatures. Or, for the first time, choose to fight as a Felyne in Prowler mode and see the world through their little furry eyes! Customise your hunting style, gear up in new armour and defend the villages from the menace of The Fated Four! - Define your unique hunter by choosing from four hunting styles, 14 weapon types and an array of devastating Hunter Arts. - Explore new villages and maps, and relive returning fan-favourites. - Hunt alone offline or continue the adventure with your fellow hunters, whether as a Hunter or Prowler, through local and online co-operative multiplayer! Happy Hunting!
